pageContext.course_type_long_description:
The Force Awakens in this advanced engineering course for young Jedi!
Discover key engineering concepts such as gear trains, worm drives, pneumatics, and eccentric motion. Build projects from LEGO® Materials such as X-Wings, AT-AT walkers, Pod Racers, Star Destroyers, Cloud Cities, Settlements, Fortresses, and other complex machines and structures from a galaxy far, far away.
pageContext.course_type_name: Jedi Master Engineering with LEGO® Materials
pageContext.action_url_comment: Registration opens Mar 1st! Register online or call 801-785-9668, ext. 601
